meanings.sent1: She recorded the number of books in the library.
meanings.sent2: The teacher recorded the students' grades in her notebook.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel recorded the number of acorns buried in the ground.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to fitness was recorded in his daily exercise log.
meanings.sent5: The historian recorded the events of the battle with great detail.

meanings.definition: Stored information in a permanent form
meanings.sent1: The vinyl record is a type of recorded music.
meanings.sent2: The recorded data is kept safe in the archives.
meanings.sent3: The recorded memories in the photo album brought back happy times.
meanings.sent4: The recorded message on the answering machine was crystal clear.
meanings.sent5: The recorded video captured the beauty of the sunset perfectly.

meanings.definition: Set down in writing or some other permanent form
meanings.sent1: He recorded his thoughts in a journal every night.
meanings.sent2: The secretary recorded the meeting minutes diligently.
meanings.sent3: The parrot recorded the sounds of the household and repeated them.
meanings.sent4: The artist recorded the beauty of the landscape in her painting.
meanings.sent5: The scientist recorded the experiment results in a detailed report.
